title: Phone unstable after reboot loop
content:
My Pixel started rebooting loop out of nowhere until battery ran out. Local phone doctor told me it was a motherboard issue. 

Got it home and somehow managed to get it through recovery mode and now it started again. Performance seems a bit slow and flaky though. 

Can I trust the phone will work from now on or is this the known motherboard issue? What can Google do for non-US out of warranty users that forked out 700 dollars for their phone 25 months ago?

EDIT: Reboot loop started again. Can get into the home screen but not for long.
